Articles.Content:
Greetings

I've noticed ever since I updated the game a few days ago (to 0.24.1) , another version has been released 0.24.2.

I tried to find the patch notes for this, but I only found up to 0.24.1 here.

I'd like to know what are the changes, since I had to spend time updating addons to 0.24.1 , and now a few days later I have to update again to 0.24.2.

What was changed? Why release another version so quickly?

If someone can clarify I'd appreciate

Edited July 27, 2014 by jebodiah1976

The two places you want to look for that information are the sidebar on the right ("Latest Articles") and The Daily Kerbal subforum.

There was a bad bug disabling in-game right-clicks on all platforms. You can read more about it here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86845-25Jul-0-24-2-Issues-Fix-HOT-TOPIC-RIGHT-CLICK-AND-BROKEN-ENGINES
